holidays.title: National Pie Day
holidays.description: Grab a slice, and celebrate the simple, delicious pleasures of a good pie.

holidays.title: Clashing Clothes Day
holidays.description: Forget about fashion do’s and don’ts and join us as we clash into Clashing Clothes Day!

holidays.title: First Philippine Republic Day
holidays.description: First Philippine Republic Day is a great opportunity to celebrate the birth of Asia’s first republic and its dogged pioneers!

holidays.title: International Sticky Toffee Pudding Day
holidays.description: Celebrate and enjoy a sticky toffee pudding today by ordering it or making it from scratch.

holidays.title: Measure Your Feet Day
holidays.description: Get out a ruler and find out if you’re really wearing the right size shoes.

holidays.title: National King Day
holidays.description: We honor you today, whether you are royalty or your name is simply King.

holidays.title: National Pedro Day
holidays.description: Today, we honor all Pedros around the world, regardless of their age!

holidays.title: National Report Pharmaceutical Fraud Day
holidays.description: Spread the word about this day to help save the Medicare program.

holidays.title: National Rhubarb Pie Day
holidays.description: Celebrate one of the world’s tastiest holidays with a nice warm bowl of rhubarb pie.

holidays.title: Parakram Divas
holidays.description: Celebrating Netaji’s courage, selflessness, and the spirit of service to Mother India!

holidays.title: Snowplow Mailbox Hockey Day
holidays.description: Mount your trucks with the best plow blade as we celebrate mailbox thrashing.

holidays.title: Alex Silva’s Birthday
holidays.description: Inspiring and loved by many, this mixed martial arts expert may be the richest wrestler!

holidays.title: Andrea’s Birthday
holidays.description: You won’t be able to stop from falling in love with Andrea’s voice and musical prowess.

holidays.title: Draya Michele’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more interesting facts about this talented actress, reality TV star, and media personality!

holidays.title: Mariska Hargitay’s Birthday
holidays.description: Mother, actress, director, and philanthropist — Mariska Hargitay performs excellently in all roles!

holidays.title: Mr Potato’s Birthday
holidays.description: Known for his adorable features and sleepiness, this cat has won the hearts of many.

holidays.title: Rutger Hauer’s Birthday
holidays.description: We witnessed the magnificence of a movie icon and the Best Dutch Actor of the Century.

holidays.title: Tiffani Thiessen’s Birthday
holidays.description: This actress, producer, and chef continues to reinvent her career throughout the years.

holidays.title: XXXtentacion’s Birthday
holidays.description: Known for his musical versatility and depression-themed music, this talented American rapper was an inspiration.
